ovdesc.p: This application contains the definition of the fees type.

desc.p: The valid record from FT.COMMISSION.TYPE. Either FLAT.RATE or FT.COMM.TYPE is mandatory.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Its a Valid record in AM.BENCHMARK
Contains the Description to the fees type
Effective date of this change. Should be either today or forward.
Flat rate to calculate the performance fees.
